title: Add --save flag to persist playlists locally
description: Implement a --save flag that stores generated playlists to ~/.config/mixaroo-lite/playlists/ as JSON files. Each playlist should include: prompt, songs, YouTube URL, timestamp. Also add 'mx-lite list' command to show saved playlists and 'mx-lite play <id>' to reopen a saved playlist URL.
acceptance_criteria: --save flag persists playlist as JSON to config directory
mx-lite list shows saved playlists with dates and prompts
mx-lite play <id> opens the saved YouTube URL

comments.text: Implemented --save flag, list, and play commands. 8 new tests, all 132 passing. Ready for QA.
